attributes.action: Hold An Immediate General Election In England Only
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Mr Brown should hold an immediate general election BUT only England should be polled. This would make sure the Primeminister is democratically elected by the English electorate as Scotland and Wales have their own Governments they should not get to vote in this general election

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Hold An Immediate General Election In England Only."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14565.asp

Prime Minister's Office
